definitions.text: make a request or demand for something to somebody
examples: She asked him for a loan

definitions.text: direct or put; seek an answer to

examples: We require our secretary to be on time
Aren't we asking too much of these children?
I expect my students to arrive in time for their lessons

definitions.text: address a question to and expect an answer from
examples: The children asked me about their dead grandmother

definitions.text: require as useful, just, or proper
examples: It takes nerve to do what she did
This job asks a lot of patience and skill

This dinner calls for a spectacular dessert
This intervention does not postulate a patient's consent

definitions.text: require or ask for as a price or condition
examples: He is asking $200 for the table
